title: Last Apple Daily newspaper edition sold out across Hong Kong
content:
1. Last Apple Daily newspaper edition sold out across Hong Kong  The Associated Press
  2. Hong Kong's Apple Daily Shuts Down Following Arrests  Bloomberg Politics
  3. ‘Forbidden Fruit’: Apple Daily, Pro-Democracy Newspaper in Hong Kong, Is Forced to Close  The New York Times
  4. Hong Kong pro-democracy paper Apple Daily to print last edition on Thursday  Reuters
  5. China's media crackdown in Hong Kong is beyond comprehension  Nikkei Asia
